name: Click & Cum
description:
In this game, you start off as a newcomer to the Adult Industry, with a small following and limited content. But with your quick clicking skills and seductive personality, you can attract more subscribers and grow your fan base.
Your objective is to create and upload as much content as possible while keeping your subscribers engaged and satisfied. You must constantly monitor your subscriber count and adjust your content to keep them interested. As you progress through the game, you will unlock new outfits, and props to improve the quality of your content and attract more subscribers.
Features:Become a successful web model and grow your fan base through strategic content creation and marketing.
Hire staff to help manage your social media presence and handle administrative tasks.
Engage in promotional activities such as collaborations with other models and advertising campaigns.
Attend events and photoshoots to increase your visibility and gain new subscribers.
ALL CHARACTERS IN THE GAME ARE OVER 18 YEARS OLD
